about_the_game:
Medieval Engineers Deluxe DLC offers you access to the soundtrack of the game. Listen to the music of the game in high quality wherever you want!



You will also unlock a special bonus banner layer, for use on your banners in the game. Show the world your love for the game.
detailed_description:
Medieval Engineers Deluxe DLC offers you access to the soundtrack of the game. Listen to the music of the game in high quality wherever you want!



You will also unlock a special bonus banner layer, for use on your banners in the game. Show the world your love for the game.
legal_notice: Medieval Engineers® and VRAGE™ are trademarks of Keen Software House.
name: Medieval Engineers - Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32-Bit (with KB971512 System Update)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5830 / NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 with at least 1024 MB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: No internet connection required to play the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Core i5-680 @ 3.6GHz, Phenom II X4 810 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 / NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 with 3 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Medieval Engineers Deluxe DLC offers you access to the soundtrack of the game, as well as unlocks a special bonus banner layer!
